meanings.sent2: I don't know anybody who lives in that house.
meanings.sent3: Anybody can be a superhero in their own story.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of possibilities, anybody can make a difference.
meanings.sent5: The park is open to anybody who wants to play.

meanings.sent1: Is anybody coming to the party?
meanings.sent2: I can't see anybody on the street.
meanings.sent3: If anybody finds my lost sock, please let me know!
meanings.sent4: In a crowd of faces, anybody could be a friend waiting to happen.
meanings.sent5: Anybody can win the game if they try their best.
